The 58th Infantry Division (, 58-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army. The entire division surrendered during the fall of Novogeorgievsk.
Organization
*1st Brigade
**229th Infantry Regiment
**230th Infantry Regiment
*2nd Brigade
**231st Infantry Regiment
**232nd Infantry Regiment
